title: Retry complete build and deployment of 2nd Bike Bajar marketplace

requirements.text: Convert the website to a Progressive Web App (PWA) by adding a web app manifest file with appropriate icons, theme colors, and display mode set to standalone, and register a service worker to enable offline capabilities and home screen installation on mobile devices

quotes: Progressive Web App (PWA) - जो mobile पर बिल्कुल app जैसा काम करेगा, users इसे अपने phone की home screen पर add कर सकेंगे

acceptanceCriteria: Web app manifest file exists with proper metadata for 2nd Bike Bajar
Service worker is registered and caches essential assets
Users can add the website to their device home screen
App opens in standalone mode without browser UI when launched from home screen

requirements.text: Create an About Us/Founder page displaying founder information including name (Anuj Saha), location (Bijapur, Chhattisgarh), contact number (7828226397), email (rohitmarpalli@gmail.com), and Instagram profile link (https://www.instagram.com/annujj_03_), with a WhatsApp icon that opens a direct chat to the founder's number when clicked

quotes: Founder की पूरी जानकारी: Anuj Saha, Bijapur Chhattisgarh, 7828226397, rohitmarpalli@gmail.com
WhatsApp आइकन क्लिक करने पर डायरेक्ट चैट ओपन होगी

acceptanceCriteria: About Us page displays all founder details accurately
WhatsApp icon opens WhatsApp chat to 7828226397 when clicked
Instagram icon links to https://www.instagram.com/annujj_03_
Page design is consistent with the overall theme

requirements.text: Implement automatic role detection in the backend to identify the founder account by matching the Internet Identity principal to the email rohitmarpalli@gmail.com, storing this mapping in stable storage, and exposing a backend function that returns whether the current caller is the founder

quotes: सभी users (buyers और founder दोनों) एक ही Internet Identity authentication से login करें और सिस्टम automatically पहचाने कि कौन founder है
Automatic Role Detection - system खुद पहचानेगा कि logged-in user founder है (rohitmarpalli@gmail.com से linked account) या regular buyer

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores mapping between founder's Internet Identity principal and email
Backend function returns true if caller is the founder, false otherwise
Founder identification persists across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Create a dedicated Founder Admin Panel page visible only to the founder (identified by rohitmarpalli@gmail.com linked account) that displays all bike listings in the marketplace with options to edit or delete any listing regardless of ownership

quotes: Founder के लिए Dedicated Admin Panel जहां: अपनी बाइक्स को लिस्ट, एडिट, और डिलीट कर सकेंगे, सभी बाइक लिस्टिंग्स को मैनेज कर सकें

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel page is only visible/accessible to the founder account
Displays all bike listings in the marketplace
Provides edit and delete actions for any listing
Regular buyers cannot access this page

requirements.text: Add a founder profile editor in the Admin Panel that allows the founder to update their details including name, address, contact number, email address, and Instagram profile link, with all changes persisted in the backend

quotes: founder ke mail id ko edit ya pir change karne ka option bi hona chaiye
Founder details (name, address, contact: 7828226397, email, Instagram) edit kर सकें

acceptanceCriteria: Founder can edit their name, address, contact number, email, and Instagram link
Changes are saved to the backend and persist across sessions
Updated information appears on the About Us page
Form validates email format before saving

requirements.text: Extend backend authorization rules to grant the founder account admin privileges allowing them to edit or delete any bike listing in the marketplace, not just their own

quotes: सभी बाइक लिस्टिंग्स को मैनेज कर सकें

acceptanceCriteria: Founder can call edit/delete functions on any bike listing
Regular users can still only edit/delete their own listings
Backend properly validates founder status before granting admin access

constraints: Use Internet Identity authentication only; no email/SMS OTP integration
Backend must use single-actor architecture with all logic in main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
Must support founder identification via email rohitmarpalli@gmail.com linked to their Internet Identity principal
nonGoals: Creating a separate Play Store native mobile app
Implementing email or SMS OTP authentication
Building separate authentication systems for buyers and founders
Integrating third-party services like Twilio or SendGrid

required: Professional modern logo for 2nd Bike Bajar Bijapur featuring a motorcycle icon with clean typography in teal and orange accent colors suitable for a trusted second-hand bike marketplace (logo.dim_512x512.png)
PWA app icon with the 2nd Bike Bajar logo optimized for mobile home screens with solid background (pwa-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
PWA app icon with the 2nd Bike Bajar logo optimized for high-resolution mobile displays (pwa-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
